entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add capability in `PEReader` to reject COFF files. #112830
  • JIT/interpreter/InterpreterTester/InterpreterTester.cmd failing under GC stress #112827

Closed

  • AssemblyLoadContext assemblies are not garbage collected #32646
  • Missing TensorPrimitives.StdDev? #112441

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add new-style ABI classifiers for return values #112829
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check ISA directly when printing `JitDisasm` #112828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consolidate guid definitions #112826
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Don't show code bytes for loongarch64 disasm unless it was told to do so #112486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • SPMI: Include JIT-EE GUID changes in JIT baseline detection #112820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try. #112809
    os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove uses of old ABI information #112818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump net10 downlevel versions to n-1 #112805
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add follow-up assert during unwinding #112817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Emit revb instructions for BSWAP #112479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Document important nuances about Dictionary/HashSet #112760
    area-System.Collections
  • FileSystem: guard against stack overflow in recursive delete (#84344) #112644
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text/Clear #112171
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize shift operations for BigInteger #112632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve support for 512-bit Vector<T> #111472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
